name: from3d
author: AFNI Developers
description: Extract 2D image files from a 3D AFNI dataset.

inputs.description: Print out verbose information during the run
inputs.name: Verbose flag

inputs.description: Adjust size of 2D data file to be NxN, by padding with zeros, where N is a power of 2.
inputs.name: N-size flag

inputs.description: Write images in 'raw' format (just the data bytes). There will be no header information saying what the image dimensions are.
inputs.name: Raw format flag

inputs.description: Write images as floats, no matter what they are in the dataset itself.
inputs.name: Float format flag

inputs.description: Set 'num' = number of first z slice to be extracted (default = 1).
inputs.name: First Z slice

inputs.description: Set 'num' = number of last z slice to be extracted (default = largest).
inputs.name: Last Z slice

inputs.description: Set 'num' = number of first time slice to be extracted (default = 1).
inputs.name: First time slice

inputs.description: Set 'num' = number of last time slice to be extracted (default = largest).
inputs.name: Last time slice
